Text:
Since Amazon has decided to break support for the original Mobipocket format in their Kindle reader app for Android (they broke PalmDoc support too), you'll have to run these through a conversion program like Calibre or an online converter such as 2epub.com

I'd like to see someone torrent Jim Baen's Universe Volume 3, number 4,5 and 6 and all six issues of Volume 4.
